channel.title: I did it before but forgot how to do it this time lol
channel.description:
i need help with my environmental variables i got a new computer so i need to reset mine can someone help me? for the runserver thing i keep getting a weird error here it is...
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
so i need the environmental variable to fix that thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2007, 01:10:33 PM[/size][hr]anyone?
